resources.string:
Before use this Application, you need to use adb tools to grant permission, copy below command and exec it on a PC:

%1$s

Or you can use root to grant permission.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
The display colours are normal\nYou can temporary enable the greyscale from the quick toggles
The display is always greyscale\nYou can temporary disable the greyscale from the quick toggles
When you press the greyscale toggle in your quick settings, you\'ll enable/disable the grayscale mode by the selected amount of time

This app has been made by Fabio Rosada, all the arts are made by Natalia Petliak.

The code is open source and you can find it on github at this link https://github.com/BerenLuth/Greyscale
It's a fork of Grayscale app made by Fei-ke and you can find his original source code at this link https://github.com/fei-ke/Greyscale
